name: The Apartment Demo
description:
Story

  • Here you will be playing Ethan the doctor's assistant he will go to the doctor's apartment and he will get the camera as the doctor asks of him and as the story progresses you will encounter a girl and you are going to find out the mystery behind it.

Controls

  • Movement = WASD
  • Crouch = Left CTRL 
  • Jump = Spacebar
  • Focus = Middle Mouse Button
  • Inventory/Objective = TAB
  • Lighter = V
  • Camera = C
